casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Leon Irwin EDELSON. No. D-2765. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 24, 2014.

Leon Irwin Edelson, of Deerfield, Illinois, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
